channel.title: Fatal-friction on Jimmie West
channel.description: Recent content in Fatal-friction on Jimmie West

item.title: Fatal Friction
item.description: A game about taking control over a ball and mastering friction to avoid a fatal outcome. The game was created in order to drive the development of the Pixleon Engine. Another important aspect of developing this game was to actually finish a game. Sounds easy but as it turns out, it is quite hard. So would I consider the game finished? Not really, but it is playable and I aim to iterate on it until I can proudly present a 1.
